modName: PRE-ALPHA PIMP MOD PLEASE READ DESC
summary: So Basically I Decided to make a pimp mod, But It is not really playable yet This is more of a reminder as I have a very short attention span to do this kind of thing
descriptionHtml:
HMHMHM Hello, So I was Watching MXR (Please check him out if you haven't[f your into sick minded sheet]) And he said in i think it was The temptress race one, any way [url=#]back[/url] on track so I looked it up and I only found Armours. And whilst that was all good I needed to add a story line and advanced things so Hence my attempt my modding skyrim
This Is what I hope to achieve
-addition of femminazi's
-"Po Po"
-Modelled Armour (Im from NZ so I am spelling it right Americans)
-A compelling story line full with Ho's and other good "friends"
-Several different weapon all of which add different [url=#]interactions[/url] with your "ho's"
-Several New shouts and enchantments
-A different variety of Armours
-Side Picking (Kind of like the dark brotherhood, so [url=#]choose[/url] as the feminzi's or the Pimp/ho's
and probably more but im too half assed to give a Fhuk
What I Have Achieved
-The start of the quest line(It is a bit buggy)
-Basic Armour
-Pimp Cane
-A guy called Jerome

So as you see pretty much absolutely nothing but still i will march on.
Quite allot of the things up above Where suggested by some one and if they want to be credited they shall be credited
 am open to Idea's and it is also greatly appreciated if you do
Now For all you feminists out their i am a humans rights supporter im not attacking women with this mod I think it is hilarious and is not harming real women in any way.
This is also Not really playable its more of a reminder to do it
author: HeWhoHasNoLife
